forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 5 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
The day unfurls in Downtown San Francisco, showcasing a picturesque scene illuminated by a gentle sun. With temperatures nudging the pleasant high of around 70 degrees, the air carries a crispness that invigorates the senses. A light breeze, whispering from the west-northwest, dances through the streets, ruffling leaves and creating an engaging play of shadows. The morning remains unblemished, with the horizon maintaining clarity, hinting at the stunning bay views that await exploration. It isn't until afternoon that a dip in temperature invites the quiet comfort of a light jacket, perfect for an evening stroll as the sky remains mostly clear, punctuated only by the distant presence of the ever-seductive Golden Gate, partially draped in its iconic mist.

For those looking to embrace the charm of the city, today is ideal for savoring a leisurely walk along the waterfront or perhaps indulging in a relaxed lunch at an open-air café, where the pleasant weather complements the delightful fare. As evening approaches, one might seek out the warmth of local galleries or quaint bookstores, all while dressed in layers that prepare you for the drop in temperature after sunset. This is a day not just to witness, but to live in—rich with moments waiting to unfold.
